input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "PicturesOnGold"
Reference Product Name: "Script Name Necklace"
Reference Product Description:
Names are beautiful and unique. Make sure you don't miss this special Modern Script Name Necklace and wear yours with style!

16 inch is perfect for a Child or someone on the shorter side.
18 Inches is the most popular size for most woman.
20 inches for anyone who is tall or likes to wear their chain on the longer side
Nameplate can measure up to 1.75 inches wide depending on name length.
Available in Sterling Silver, 14k Gold & Gold Plated

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='BaubleBar Initial Chain Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Two Name Handwriting Necklace'
  - Name='14K Solid Gold Farsi Name Necklace'
  - Name='BaubleBar Disney Mickey Mouse Custom Acrylic Necklace'
  - Name='BaubleBar Disney Mickey Mouse Custom Acrylic Nameplate Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Gold Necklace with Custom Diamond Nameplate'
  - Name='BaubleBar Women's Lucky Number Bubble Necklace'
  - Name='Baublebar 18K Gold Custom Nameplate Necklace - Mini Melbourne'
  - Name='BaubleBar Semi-Precious Block Initial Necklace'
  - Name='BaubleBar Initial Pendant Necklace'
  - Name='BaubleBar Classic Script Initial Necklace'
  - Name='BaubleBar Clover Initial Pendant Necklace'
  - Name='BaubleBar Initial Triad Necklace'
  - Name='18K Gold Custom Number Block Font Necklace'
  - Name='14K Gold Sterling Silver Cursive Name Necklace'
  - Name='14K Solid Gold Custom Name Necklace'
  - Name='18K Gold Custom Spaced Number Necklace'
  - Name='BaubleBar Custom Bubble Monogram Necklace'
  - Name='14K Solid Gold Personalized Name Necklace'
  - Name='14K Solid Gold Personalized Script Name Necklace'
  - Name='personalized nameplate necklace with diamond accents'
  - Name='Custom Child Name Necklace'
  - Name='BaubleBar Classic Custom Gold Initial Necklace'
  - Name='18K Gold Custom Angel Number Necklace'
  - Name='BaubleBar Gwen Mini Bubble Initial Necklace'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Displays a single initial rather than a full name in script; related as a personalized necklace, but different level of customization.
Similar silhouette and customization, allows two names and emphasizes handwritten/script style.
Identical necklace format with the distinction of language (Farsi vs. English); core function and style match closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BaubleBar Disney Mickey Mouse Custom Acrylic Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Custom but focused on a Disney/Mickey Mouse motif rather than script names; different construction and intended appeal.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BaubleBar Disney Mickey Mouse Custom Acrylic Nameplate Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nameplate function matches, but the Disney/Mickey Mouse design shifts focus away from simple name-based personalization.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Gold Necklace with Custom Diamond Nameplate
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly comparable, adding diamond accents; nameplate core remains the same.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BaubleBar Women's Lucky Number Bubble Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Personalized but uses numbers instead of names, with a different font style (bubble), making it less similar in primary appeal.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Baublebar 18K Gold Custom Nameplate Necklace - Mini Melbourne
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nearly identical: custom nameplate construction and customization style match the reference.
Single initial instead of a full name; block font and semi-precious element distinguish it from the script name necklace.
Personalized, but only features an initial, not a full name; pendant construction may differ but shares the necklace format.
Uses script but only for an initial; partially matches function and style.
Initial-based and with a clover motif, so only loosely related to full script name necklaces.
Multi-initial design shifts away from the single, continuous script nameplate concept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 18K Gold Custom Number Block Font Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Personalized but with numbers and block font, diverging from the script name style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 14K Gold Sterling Silver Cursive Name Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Almost perfectly matches: cursive/script name, available in similar materials.
Identical function—custom name, solid gold, same type and style.
Numbers and spaced style rather than nameplate script, so less relevant.
Monogramming (initials) uses bubble font, distinct from script nameplate necklaces.
Same product type and features as the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 14K Solid Gold Personalized Script Name Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nearly identical to the reference, with the script and gold material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: personalized nameplate necklace with diamond accents
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly comparable nameplate necklace, with addition of diamond accents.
Core concept matches—a custom script name necklace, possibly smaller/shorter for children.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BaubleBar Classic Custom Gold Initial Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Customizable, but focuses on a single initial, not a full script name.
Personalized with numbers (angel numbers), distinct from name-based script necklaces.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BaubleBar Gwen Mini Bubble Initial Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Uses initials and a bubble font, not a full name in script; shares basic custom necklace category.
